resources.string:
To use this function you must be at least 18 years or older, or use it under parental supervision.

 Also, to make use of this function, you must read and agree the following:

1) If you are a minor, then you will not use this function.

2) When browsing content, you will abide to your own country laws, thereby you will not browse content, if it can be deemed as a felony.

3) You will not make use of this app with illegal, dark, malicious or evil-promoting intentions, and as such, you will not make use of this app to cause any kind of intentional bullying, damage or injure by any means another entity, neither to yourself.

4) This app is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the app or the use or other dealings in the software.

5) You are using this app only for personal use. 

6) You understand that there may be content in the app that does not appeal to you or you feel is morally wrong.

7) You accept that the app is not liable for any content that you may stumble upon.
